biotools.summary: Directly extract stable carbon isotope fingerprints (SIFs) of individual species in a microbial community from a metaproteomic dataset. It takes the scored peptide-spectrum match (PSM) tables for samples and the calibration material, and the raw MS data in mzML format as input.

bioschemas.name: Calis-p
bioschemas.summary: Directly extract stable carbon isotope fingerprints (SIFs) of individual species in a microbial community from a metaproteomic dataset. It takes the scored peptide-spectrum match (PSM) tables for samples and the calibration material, and the raw MS data in mzML format as input.
